Package uk.ac.ljmu.fet.cs.csw.CompetitiveMinesweeper.gui

Class SpotEventHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ljmu.fet.cs.csw.CompetitiveMinesweeper.gui.SpotEventHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MouseListener, EventListener
    public class SpotEventHandler
extends Object
implements MouseListener
    Offers visual feedback if the user is hovering over a particular spot. Also allows mouse click events to be interpreted as user's wish to pick (left-click) or flag (right-click) a spot.
    Author:
    "Gabor Kecskemeti, Department of Computer Science, Liverpool John Moores University, (c) 2019"

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private FlashableJLabel inGrid
      The label that is in the visual grid representation of the map.
      static Color mouseover
      When the mouse is over a particular spot, this colour is used to flash the given spot to give a sense of more interactivity to the user.
      private int myColCoord
      The coordinates of the spot that this event handler is responsible for.
      private MineMap myMap
      The map that is to be solved
      private int myRowCoord
      The coordinates of the spot that this event handler is responsible for.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      SpotEventHandler​(MineMap myMap, FlashableJLabel inGrid, int rowCoord, int colCoord)
      Allows to customize the event handler and make sure it correctly identifies with a particular spot in the map.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void mouseClicked​(MouseEvent arg0)
      Sending out the messages to the map to explore it further
      void mouseEntered​(MouseEvent arg0)
      Highlights the GUI item if we hover over them with a special, short white flash.

    • Field Detail

      • mouseover

        public static final Color mouseover
        When the mouse is over a particular spot, this colour is used to flash the given spot to give a sense of more interactivity to the user.

      • myMap

        private final MineMap myMap
        The map that is to be solved

      • inGrid

        private FlashableJLabel inGrid
        The label that is in the visual grid representation of the map. The grid is created and maintained by SingleGamePanel.

      • myRowCoord

        private final int myRowCoord
        The coordinates of the spot that this event handler is responsible for.

      • myColCoord

        private final int myColCoord
        The coordinates of the spot that this event handler is responsible for.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpotEventHandler

        public SpotEventHandler​(MineMap myMap,
                        FlashableJLabel inGrid,
                        int rowCoord,
                        int colCoord)
        Allows to customize the event handler and make sure it correctly identifies with a particular spot in the map.
        Parameters:
        myMap - The map to be solved
        inGrid - The label that represents the spot in the UI created grid.
        rowCoord - The row coordinate of the spot that this handler is responsible for.
        colCoord - The column coordinate of the spot that this handler is responsible for.
